name: Lex Finalis Demo WebGL
description:
This is a project that I made for my Unity Learning course.

Its based on StarFox and I used the basic idea of perpetual running games to generate the level.

There are 3 sections to the level and 1 boss.

The base difficulty is between medium and hard, so it will be a challenge, the original build was solidly medium, the WebGL version is strangely harder.

Every 500 points will give you an extra life.

If you wish to just fight the boss simple press B!

Upload your highscore.

All the things that I did:

Coding - alot from tutorials, I'll list them here soon.

Models, via Blender.

Sprites, via Acesprite.

Things that I didn't do:

Particle effects, these are from a free asset pack.

Sounds, all from freesound.

Music, also from freesound, I will give credit here for the tracks soon.
